title: Choose a Program
content: Click on any program card to purchase tickets for that specific program. Each program has its own ticket allocation and pricing.

title: Your Ticket Balance
content: This displays your organisation's total available tickets across all programs. These tickets can be allocated to attendees when registering for events.

title: Page Tour Button
content: Click this button anytime to replay the guided tour for the current page. It's available on every page to help you whenever you need it.

title: Welcome to AGCAS Event Tickets
content: This portal allows you to purchase program tickets for upcoming AGCAS events. Follow this guided tour to understand how to buy tickets, manage your balances, and register for events effectively.

title: Purchase Tickets
content: Here you can specify how many tickets to purchase and choose how to pay either by account or Credit/Debit card.

title: Enter Ticket Quantity
content: Simply enter the number of tickets you need. Any available discounts or special offers will be applied automatically to your purchase.

title: Amount Due
content: This shows the total amount you need to pay after any automatic discounts or offers have been applied.

title: Charge to Organisation Account
content: Select this option to charge the purchase to your organisation's account. You'll need to provide a purchase order number to complete the transaction.

title: Pay by Credit/Debit Card
content: Choose this option to complete your purchase immediately using a secure credit or debit card payment via Stripe.

title: Purchase Order Number
content: Please enter an official purchase order number here. If you don't know the PO number, add TBC instead and forward to learning@agcas.org.uk within five days.

title: Apply Discount Code
content: If you have a promotional discount code, enter it in this field and click 'Apply' to see your reduced total.

title: Complete Your Purchase
content: Once you've finalised your ticket quantity and payment method, click this button to complete your purchase.

title: Select an event
content: Choose the event you wish to register from the events shown.

title: Register for an event
content: Select the event

title: Select an event.
content: Select an event to register yourself or colleagues for.

title: Booking Summary
content: Track the number of event tickets you need and your remaining available program tickets as you register attendees.

title: Register Yourself
content: Toggle this switch if you plan to attend this event. This will add you to the attendee list.

title: Search for Colleagues
content: Find existing colleagues by typing their name or email. If they're not listed, you can still add them to the attendee list by entering their email address manually.

title: Confirm Booking
content: Once all attendees are added and you're ready, click this button to finalise your registration. Confirmation and event tickets will be sent to the attendees' emails.

title: Add Another Colleague
content: Click this button to search for and add more colleagues to your attendee list.

title: Your Event Booking
content: Each booking groups all registered attendees for a specific event under a unique booking reference. You can see who you registered here.

title: Individual Ticket Details
content: Each person registered for an event has their own individual ticket. Here you can see their details and status within this booking.

title: Return Ticket
content: Click this icon to return this individual event ticket to your available balance. This action will free up the ticket for reallocation and cannot be undone.

title: Your Event Ticket
content: Each card here represents an individual ticket you hold for an event. It shows key event details, your attendance status, and options to manage your registration.

title: Add Event to Your Calendar
content: Click here to download an ICS file, which you can use to easily add this event directly to your personal calendar (e.g., Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar).

title: Return Ticket
content: Click this icon to return your individual event ticket to your available balance. This action will free up the ticket for reallocation and cannot be undone.

title: View Event Details
content: Click this button to go directly to the event's public page. Here you can find more detailed information, speaker bios, agendas, and other relevant resources.

title: Welcome to Your Transaction History!
content: This page provides a detailed overview of your organisation's program ticket balances and a comprehensive record of all related transactions. Explore your purchases, usages, returns and download invoices for each program transaction.
